sentences.sContent: She knew no more shorthand than if she had been a graduate in stenography just let slip upon the world by a business college.
sentences.sContent_eng: She knew no more shorthand than if she had been a graduate in stenography just let slip upon the world by a business college.
sentences.sCn: 她并不太精通速记，就像是刚刚走出商学院速记专业的毕业学生，来闯荡世界。

sentences.sContent: Coursework included: secretarial principles, office administration, management, business English, English word processing, stenography, bookkeeping.
sentences.sContent_eng: Coursework included: secretarial principles, office administration, management, business English, English word processing, stenography, bookkeeping.
sentences.sCn: 课程包括：秘书原理，办公室行政，管理学，商用英语，英语文字处理，速记学，簿记。

words.tran: 速记的；利用速记的；简洁的

trans.tranOther: a fast way of writing in which you use special signs or short forms of words, used especially to record what someone is saying
